column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=After a long day at work I decided I wanted to take a bath .
#text=I went into the bathroom put the plug into the drain and turned the water on in the tub so it would fill with water .
#text=Then I got undressed and grabbed a towel to use when I was done .
#text=I got in the tub and once it was full of hot water I turned off the tap .
#text=I got my hair wet and shampooed my hair and applied some conditioner then washed my body using some liquid body wash .
#text=I washed the soap off myself and washed the conditioner out of my hair .
#text=Then I just sat and relaxed in the tub for awhile .
#text=When I was ready to get out , I pulled the plug out of the drain , got out and grabbed my towel and dried myself off .
#text=Then I put on some clean clothes and blow dried my hair .
